name: Dr. Aris Thorne
dialogue_style: Precise and academic, with a tendency to lapse into scientific jargon, though she makes an effort to be understood.

quests.name: Seeds of Hope
quests.description: Retrieve rare pre-war seeds from an overgrown agricultural research station.

quests.name: Toxic Bloom
quests.description: Investigate and neutralize a mutated, aggressive plant species threatening a settlement.

backstory: Before the collapse, Dr. Thorne worked on developing drought-resistant crops. She survived the initial chaos by fortifying her university's greenhouse, gradually expanding into a network of survivors dedicated to restoring agriculture. She now believes that the key to humanity's future lies not in scavenging the past, but in cultivating a new one.
